languages.text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} grants them {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 2)</u>. Works up to 3 times per turn.
languages.original_text: Каждый раз, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} в количестве, равном половине его {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}. Срабатывает не более 3 раз за ход.

traits.locale_text: Every Critical Hit the Tactician makes grants them Momentum equal to half of the their's Resolve. Works up to 3 times per turn.

Every critical hit the Tactician makes grants them momentum equal to half of their resolve. Works up to 3 times per turn.

languages.original_text: Every critical hit the Tactician makes grants them momentum equal to half of their resolve. Works up to 3 times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждый раз, совершая критическое попадание, тактик получает моментум в количестве, равном половине его решимости. Срабатывает не более 3 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.
Каждый раз, совершая критическое попадание, тактик получает моментум в количестве, равном половине его решимости. Срабатывает не более 3 раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}每次{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}/2）</u>。此效果每回合最多只能触发3次。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} grants them {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 2)</u>. Works up to 3 times per turn.

traits.locale_text: 战术专家每次{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}的一半。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}最多只能触发3次。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}每次{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}/2）</u>。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}最多只能触发3次。

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} efectuado por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} le otorga {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} igual a <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} / 2)</u>. Funciona un máximo de 3 veces por turno.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} grants them {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 2)</u>. Works up to 3 times per turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} efectuado por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} le otorga tanto {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} como la mitad de su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}. Funciona un máximo de 3 veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}, den der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erzielt, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} in Höhe von <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} / 2)</u>. Funktioniert bis zu 3 Mal pro Zug.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} grants them {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 2)</u>. Works up to 3 times per turn.

traits.locale_text: Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}, den der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} erzielt, erlangt er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} entsprechend der Hälfte seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}. Funktioniert bis zu 3× pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} infligé par le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} lui confère une {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} égale à <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} / 2)</u>. Fonctionne jusqu'à 3 fois par tour.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} scored by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} grants them {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} / 2)</u>. Works up to 3 times per turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} infligé par le Tacticien lui confère une {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égale à la moitié de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}. Fonctionne jusqu'à 3 fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出すたびに、<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g} / 2)</u>に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る。1ターンにつき3回まで発動する。
